backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor defining RoomListing type and storage with functions to add room listings and query available/all rooms using a Map data structure.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting PWA implementation including manifest configuration, service worker, icon assets, and app name updates with high confidence test mappings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing the Bachelor Room Finder app's routing, components, styling, and PWA functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes, defining a warm color palette for the application.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with PWA meta tags, manifest link, theme color, and app title "Bachelor Room Finder".
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme colors, and standalone display mode for Bachelor Room Finder.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing cache-first strategy for static assets and network-first for API calls with offline fallback support.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component configuring TanStack Router with three routes (home, room detail, add listing) wrapped in a Layout component.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing Navigation header, main content area, and footer with caffeine.ai attribution across all pages.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Sticky header with logo, app title, navigation buttons for browsing/adding rooms, and conditional PWA install button.
frontend/src/components/RoomCard.tsx: Reusable card component displaying room preview with image, title, location, rent amount, room type badge, and view details button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook managing backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, returning actor instance with automatic query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/usePWAInstall.ts: React hook that manages Progressive Web App installation state and prompts, detecting if the app is installable, already installed, or running in standalone mode.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching available/all rooms and adding room listings, with automatic cache invalidation and toast notifications on success/error.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a warm color palette (terracotta, sage, beige) for light and dark themes, including chart colors and design tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AddListingPage.tsx: Form page for adding new room listings with validation, amenity selection, room type/availability dropdowns, and success confirmation screen after submission.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page displaying a grid of available room listings with loading and empty states, showing room cards fetched from the backend.
frontend/src/pages/RoomDetailPage.tsx: Detail page for individual room listings showing full information including image, location, rent, amenities, room type, and contact details with back navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file that defines a custom design system with OKLCH color variables, custom fonts (Inter, Poppins), extended theme tokens for UI components, and includes typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking a room rental listing PWA application for bachelor accommodations, documenting existing features (homepage grid, detail pages, add listing form, PWA configuration), architectural notes, and image requirements for app icons.
